revised_title: On the Distribution of Frequency, Variation, and Correlation of Barometric Height at Diverse Stations
tldr: This article investigates the distribution of barometric height frequency, variation, and correlation at various stations in the British Isles. The authors find that the frequency distribution is continuous and fairly uniform along lines called generalised isobars. They also discuss the constants that best describe a local barometric frequency and explore the concept of correlation between stations.
